branchCategory.name: C(D)S2, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CS2 with stroke options provides unique solutions for specialized applications.  It has the same great features as the standard CS2 air cylinder.  Lightweight aluminum die-cast is used for both the rod and head covers.  This series is available in bore sizes 125mm, 140mm, and 160mm.  Air cushions are standard on both ends.</p>

breadCrumb.name: C(D)S2, Double Acting, Single Rod, Stroke Options
